Plot: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who has been living under a false name, is arrested by military police and placed on trial for the murder of villagers while he was in the Marines.
Title: High Crimes
Writer: Joseph Finder (novel), Yuri Zeltser (screenplay), Grace Cary Bickley (screenplay)
Actors: Ashley Judd, Morgan Freeman, Jim Caviezel, Adam Scott
